oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Hotpoint Automatic Electric Range
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Advertising; Electricity; Nashville Railway and Light Company;
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: One color half sheet (black on white) announcing Hotpoint Automatic Electric Range, the modern maid for modern mothers, for $4.95 down with 24 months to pay. Poster was printed for the Tennessee Electric Power Company, which was formerly the Nashville Railway and Light Company.
